review: I had been to doctor as I had a ligament issue. Doctor was good. He prescribed medicines. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. Doctor told to do surgery, need to visit again. Physiotherapy was not suggested.
I visited doctor. I had shoulder pain. ********* *** ***** No waiting time and it was good response. He explained very well. I will recommend doctor to my friends and family.
